item.description:
This meetup's topic is Monitoring MySQL efficiently with Nagios, including a new Nagios plugin that was written this year...presented by Sheeri Cabral of PalominoDB.

 

------------- Logistics -------------

 

Directions:  Note that while public transit is possible, it's not recommended. 

5 Wayside Rd, Burlington, MA Go to route 128/95, Burlington, exit 33. Take exit 33A  and merge to Cambridge street. On the 1st traffic light  take right and go to the 1st left turn just across Capital  Grille restaurant. Take this left turn. The large 4 story building is the one. Go around it leaving it on the left and see the entry glass door with Nokia sign  and two flags. You are there.
item.how_to_find_us: The large 4 story building is the one. Go around it leaving it on the left and see the entry glass door with Nokia sign and two flags. You are there.
item.name: The Boston MySQL Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
